captions.sentence: Goodbye, my friend.
Goodbye.

Shoot them all.

Pull up.

captions.chinese: 我们必须把他们逼到反应堆入口

captions.sentence: I need you on the ground, I'll be in the air. Go.

captions.chinese: 情况变了  你的命令已经过时了

captions.chinese: 我和你一样也是警察  我现在就走过去

captions.sentence: Please do not shoot me!
Shoot at his feet.
Nothing like a little air superiority.
captions.chinese: 掌握制空权的感觉最好了

captions.chinese: 警探  请你站住  快停下

captions.chinese: 你们必须把炸弹转移过来  还有10分钟时间

captions.sentence: They're pushing us to the entrance of the reactor.

captions.chinese: 他们想把炸弹放回反应堆

captions.sentence: You idiots!

captions.chinese: 你个混蛋  你害死了我们所有人

captions.sentence: Yeah, follow your orders!
captions.chinese: 只知道服从命令的混蛋

captions.chinese: 好了  孩子们  围成圈  低下头

captions.chinese: 神父  大家都回到车上去  好吗

There's nowhere to go.
On the bus!

Stay straight!

captions.chinese: 帮我一把  我们在上面绑根绳子

captions.sentence: Fox showed me how to override the reactor.
captions.chinese: 福克斯教过我怎么改写反应堆

captions.sentence: Oh, dear.
lncluding the emergency flood.

captions.chinese: 现在不可能阻止炸弹爆炸了

Protection from the blast.
captions.chinese: 保护他们免受炸弹冲击

captions.sentence: We're gonna be all right!

Think they need to hear that?

captions.chinese: 你想让他们绝望地死去吗  来吧

captions.sentence: Prepare yourselves.
My father's work is done.
-What are you doing? -I can get it out over the bay!
captions.chinese: -你干什么  -我能把炸弹运到海上去

captions.sentence: Set it to fly out over the water, then eject?
captions.chinese: 设置好飞到海上空然后抛射吗

captions.sentence: No autopilot.

captions.chinese: 做任何事  但你偏偏选择回来

I guess we're both suckers.

captions.chinese: -我从不在乎你是谁  -那就对了

Even a man doing something as simple and reassuring as
captions.chinese: 即使那个人做的事是那么简单

captions.sentence: putting a coat around a young boy's shoulders
captions.chinese: 他为一个小男孩披上一件外套

captions.sentence: to let him know the world hadn't ended.
captions.chinese: 告诉他这不是世界末日

Come on, Father.
Hey, heads down! This is it!
-No. -No, that's Batman!
That's detonation!

captions.chinese: 炸弹在海上爆炸  城市安全了

captions.sentence: "I see a beautiful city
and a brilliant people rising from this abyss.
captions.chinese: 升起一座美丽的城市  一个卓越的民族

captions.sentence: I see the lives for which I lay down my life
captions.chinese: 我看到我为之献身的人们

captions.sentence: peaceful useful, prosperous and happy.
captions.chinese: 过着宁静有益  富裕幸福的生活

captions.sentence: I see that I hold a sanctuary in their hearts
captions.chinese: 我看到  在他们心中

captions.sentence: and in the hearts of their descendants
captions.chinese: 在他们世世代代的子孙心中

captions.sentence: generations hence.
captions.chinese: 我始终占有神圣的一席之地

captions.sentence: It is a far, far better thing that I do
captions.chinese: 我现在做的  是我一生中

captions.sentence: than I have ever done.
captions.chinese: 做过的最好  最最好的事情

captions.sentence: It is a far, far better rest that I go to
captions.chinese: 我即将得到的  是我一生中

captions.sentence: than I have ever known."
captions.chinese: 得到过的最安宁  最最安宁的休息

captions.sentence: I'm so sorry.
I failed you.
You trusted me
and I failed you.
Can I change your mind

captions.chinese: 你说过  制度会成为枷锁

captions.chinese: 你说得没错  我无法接受这样的不公正

captions.chinese: 没人知道是谁拯救了这座城市

captions.chinese: 涉及他宅邸的部分  将不做修改

captions.chinese: 尽管如此  它们依然是相当昂贵的资产

captions.chinese: 房屋和土地权归哥谭市所有

captions.chinese: 它们将被用作  并只能被用作

Bruce Wayne.
